website_summaries.verdict: The DeLonghi MultiFry 1363 isn't as flexible as an Instant Pot but air-fries food well with less oil.
pros: The DeLonghi MultiFry uses air to cook food with less oil
Food comes out crispy and flavorful and tastes almost deep fried
cons: It's really an air fryer at heart and not an Instant Pot-style multicooker
It can't speed up cook times like a pressure cooker and works as fast as an oven

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MACHINE!!! DONT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine on February 13, 2018. Today a little over a year later this machine totally died. So naturally I contacted Delonghi's customer service who informed me that I was out of warranty by a few weeks. What! Listen to me, I and some others have stated this machine totally stops working. Delonghi instead of improving the quality of their products or replacing my machine, offered me a measly 20% discount on another machine. What! Why would I ever buy some $200 crap that's only going to last me a year? You've been forewarned. Its going to quit working on you too eventually. Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Wright

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again if I lost this one
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month now and it stays in use almost every day. It makes wonderful air fried vegetables such as brussel sprouts, green beans, broccoli and air fried cauliflower taste delicious! I just add a smidgen of oil and seasoning and wait until it smells good. Slightly crisp edges that are gently browned with an excellent degree of doneness. I've found a lady from Canada on a YouTube channel that makes many things in hers, and she inspired me to make this worthy purchase. Chicken wings come out very well with this unit, as do many other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have had this air fryer for 1 year and 5 months. I have loved it for all of that time... Until today when it stopped working mid cooking. I called Delonghi and was told that there was nothing that could be done. I used this air fryer 1-2 times per week if that. I do not believe that a product that costs almost $300 should only last 1 year and 5 months. Now I have to toss it in the garbage. Way to back up your product Delonghi. I'll make sure to tell everyone not to purchase your products. My T-Fal Actifry is still going strong and I bought it in 2015. 😡🤬
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Varrati

customer_reviews.title: No auto shutoff on this unit!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade my T-Fal air fryer thinking this would be a great replacement for it. I got it in the mail and behold, for $200 it doesn't even have an auto shutoff feature. I like the fact that it has a bigger capacity than my current T-Fal unit, but at least that one ($150) had an auto shutoff. Very disappointing and De'Longhi will be getting this unit back. I looked on their website and they do have one with this feature, but is an international unit and not sold in the US or Canada. I just have to shake my head on this one. I'll say it again, very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zanne

customer_reviews.title: My husband thinks this is the greatest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this air fryer about 2 months ago, we have made cakes, chicken, brownies, steaks, pork chops, blossoming onions in it. My husband thinks this is the greatest thing ever. And I love it too because he actually will make meals for us in it. Everything we have tried has turned out wonderful. Just be careful with the lid it opens by push bottom and tends to fly open, so we always try to remember to slow the lid down so we don't break it off.
customer_reviews.author: colanut

customer_reviews.title: I love how it makes the skin crispy on the chicken.  I’m getting hungry typing this.
customer_reviews.text: I am an Amazon addict. I need help. I have packages arriving daily to the point where I don’t know what’s in each box I’m about to open. This MultiFry has to be one of the top purchases I’ve made in the past year. I can cook my chicken thighs in half the time of my conventional oven. The taste is amazing. I usually don’t take the time to write reviews, but this one here is a winner. Go on and spend the extra money on this one. You won’t regret it. You have nothing to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Holmes, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I got it few months ago and now is broken ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it few months ago and now is broken and it can NOT work anymore. I just used it few time and I can NOT believe the quality is awful and De' Longhi does NOT offer shipping label to do warranty. I regret that I bought De' Longhi not Philip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this today - mixed results on fries and chicken wings
customer_reviews.text: We are just starting our journey with the multifry. We tried fries 2 ways (lunch and dinner). Thicker cut was definitely better, but the fries were just tough. We tried making homemade vs frozen. Will try frozen and see if that turns out better. I ended up overcooking the chicken wings a bit, but the skin was AWESOME. Will just need to figure out the timing a bit. I think I just need more practice :) Cleanup has been easy, so far. UPDATE: Frozen fries/tater tots come out much better than homemade french fries. Roasted Cauliflower and Brussel sprouts were ok, but are better in the oven. I find it a big piece of expensive equipment for it's limited use.
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in 9 months. Apparently the warranty sucks. Not exactly what I'm expecting after shelling out more than $200 for it. While it was working, it was spacious but as with all DeLonghi products, the power wasn't quite there.
customer_reviews.author: moomoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy air frying. I have purchased 2 other air fryers that I like, but this one is fun to use. Had some problems initially with taking the paddle out. It seems that this is a common problem. But after using the fryer with the paddle many times, it began to come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: GG Mom

customer_reviews.title: need's a 10 star
customer_reviews.text: This will do anything you want, you can bake, make stew, fry, anything you cook on the stove you can use this for, I have used it everyday since I have had it. My stove is clean, I very seldom use it. it's a must to have
customer_reviews.author: Nyoka

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in February of 2018 and it shut down in the middle of cooking on October 2019. I only use this machine about twice a month. On line chat with DeLonghi and it cannot be fixed and offered me 20% to purchase a new one!! Do not purchase - I see many more reviews with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: malaysian

customer_reviews.title: Not so surround cooking & it's not as fast as a air frier!
customer_reviews.text: I am still experimenting with it but so far.... It browns on the bottom faster so there is a need to flip sometimes. I'm wondering if I should have purchased the smaller one because the food would be closer to the top heating element, and cooking more evenly on both sides at once. The paddle didn't mix up my chili very well, some of the beans stayed on the top long enough to split open and dry out so I had to manually stir things up. I does fry with little to no oil to a nice crunch! I think the more I use it the more I will like!
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want to buy a new one each year or so.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Jan 22, 2018 and it stopped working on Oct 1, 2018. Returned it (at my cost) to repair and they sent me a refurbished one 6 weeks later on Nov 16, 2018. I didn't use it again until May of 2019 and now in May of 2020 it has stopped working again, and the warranty is out. At least the first one broke before the one year of use so I could squeeze a second year out of them. Too bad every single thing I cooked out of this was incredibly delicious, or I could have given it one star! I'm buying another but, will have to try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Shores

customer_reviews.title: The few things I've cooked with it turned out fine, but the home-made fries didn't get crisp like ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't experimented with it as much as I should, largely because I can't keep it in the kitchen. Counter space is already crowded. Plus, it makes a substantial amount of noise when it's running, so I've been keeping it on the garage work bench. The few things I've cooked with it turned out fine, but the home-made fries didn't get crisp like I thought they should. Maybe I didn't give them enough time.
customer_reviews.author: Street Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use multi fryer
customer_reviews.text: The best multi fryer, easy to use & very user friendly. I bought 2 & use it everyday for most of my frying.
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but loud.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but WOW it is loud! Wish it had a timed turn off, but i set a reminder with Alexa have not burned anything in it yet! Next move is to use it on a smart switch.......No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: E. Parrinello

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this model
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I use this product all the time. I highly recommend this model. If anyone has any questions please feel free to ask and I will answer them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I owned this product for 18 months. Used only occasionally (perhaps once or twice a month). Worked well. Only lasted 18 mos and broke. Be warned! Now I have to buy another air fryer, but it won't be this one again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tweedle_bug

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this air fryer. Large capacity and easy to use! I bought it for my brother. He uses it every day. Makes great fries with 1 tbsp of oil! He’s buying me one for Christmas! I can’t wait to try it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O. Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Not just an air fryer !
customer_reviews.text: Love this multi cooker works great as air fryer but also can cook meals one of my favorite things to make in mine is pepper steak it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda P.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use this suddenly woukdnt come on. Very cery disappointed. A friends had same thing happen. Talkibg to customer service
customer_reviews.author: MARGIE

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer is great! Makes cooking so much easier and healthier
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is great! Makes cooking so much easier and healthier. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to cook healthy
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: This after are is top-notch very good very pleased with it my second one that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This after are is top-notch very good very pleased with it my second one that I have but my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not working !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excuse me i need to connect with someone !!! The prodect is not working well .. there is no sound for the motor to work and the paddle inside is not working !! And the food is not cooked well !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayaabdelhakam

customer_reviews.title: Got a replacement when the product came back in stock two weeks later. Not sure what happened, anyways, she loved the fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new FH1363 fryer for my wife as a thanksgiving gift. We wanted the fryer for a while, she was so happy and excited expecting the package to arrive. However it is so disappointed when we received and unboxed the fryer, since it doesn't look like a new one. There are scratches at the back side of the fryer. Looking inside the fryer, the heating coil looks like used, and the bottom of the inner pot even has an obvious damage which was already marked..?! How did this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Delonghi multicooker. Easy to use and clean and so many ways we’ve used it. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, wash and enjoy more time not in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Best small appliance ever!!! We use this 2-3 times a week. Cooks everything. Love to see how dinners taste after trying something new - never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Boesken

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: This air fry is awesome. Cooks fast. Little loud but nice
customer_reviews.author: Ted Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but fryer is not good
customer_reviews.text: The multi cooking function is good but if you need air fryer you need to buy a new machine.
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works the way a multifryer should the spinning blade helps a lot
customer_reviews.author: M. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Love the DeLonghi in general (especially espresso machines) but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the DeLonghi in general (especially espresso machines) but I can’t say the same about this machine. There’s an internal spatula within the pan that is made of plastic. Even with the spatula removed, the spinning mechanism is made of plastic. I can’t imagine the plastic part being good for the health long term, especially in such a high heat environment.
customer_reviews.author: OMS 317

customer_reviews.title: A bit complicated. Needs an additional basket to use ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit complicated. Needs an additional basket to use without stirring option.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: This is the third air frier we have tried. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third air frier we have tried. The paddle doesn't turn the food over as well as the Tefal model and this one does not shut off when the time expires. Other models shut off but don't turn food over. Both have their positive attributes. Have this one to our son.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the Air-Fryer, glad we got the big one
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. We've made roasted potatoes, fries from scratch, coated chicken legs, chicken wings from bulk chicken, fries from store bought bags, and everything came out better than from the oven or deep-frying. I'm glad we bought the large one. This is a very nice way to keep eating the things we like without all the fats.
customer_reviews.author: No Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: Too loud, and just took up more room, might of used, but sent it back .cost out way benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. The paddle arm on this junk broke 2 days after return window. Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing just turns and turns. I wish I could return it but I waited too late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I have this since Nov. 2017 and since then, I probably use this 2-3 a week. My family's favorite dishes are chicken wings, It takes about 40-45 minutes to cook it and it came out crispy and perfect each time. For vegetables, somehow it tastes better from here too compare to stove top cook or in the big oven. It is easy to clean, most of the time i just put it in the dish washer. Very happy with this purchase and I even bought one for my mom that's how much I love this!
customer_reviews.author: bearcoca

customer_reviews.title: She's Fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile cooking. Can cook and bake just about everything. Make soup, bake cakes, and so much more. Booger500us, on YouTube has made so many recipes in her De'Longhi multifry air fryer. She's a must watch on YouTube. I watched her make fried green cherry tomatoes, after seeing her make those, I subscribed to her channel and ordered the De'Longhi multifry. She's Fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Most reviews on Air Fryers are highly biased - this fryer is best kept secret
customer_reviews.text: I have used 3-4 air fryers and frankly I liked them all. But using De'Longhi's has been a privilege to own. High quality product with great finishes. Cooking is impeccable. Most importantly, you are not constraint by cooking dry things only (like french fries, roast chicken etc), you can do ALL kinds of cooking. I personally, I love gravies, soups, and this air fryer is the best kept secret. One helpful tip: Add water towards the end when food is already cooked (if you are making soups) since I think the hot air (that cooks food) will have harder time to travel through water to cook any further. Overall: FANTASTIC product. Best kept secret. Beats all other air fryers.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Fiamma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to deep frying
customer_reviews.text: We have tried French fry, chicken tenders & fry and wings (cut). All can out very good. Very light coating of oil and seasoned prior to putting into the inner pot. Came out with a little crunch on the outside and moist inside. Easy to clean. The only con that we have seen is that I wish it had a temperature scale/reading rather then a power setting (1 - 4).
customer_reviews.author: Chick W

customer_reviews.title: Forget the rest, this is the one
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I've had it about a month so far and have made wings for college students, fries, chicken breast tenders and drumsticks (dry rubbed, not breaded), shrimp, mozzarella sticks, potatoes, bread and even black bean burgers. And I haven't even started on the long list of recipes in the De'Longhi app yet. Everything has been excellent. The most oil I've used in anything is a couple of quick sprays of peanut oil. Don't let the complaints about the temperature settings dissuade you, or the lack of auto shutoff. The functionality and effectiveness of this fryer are the things that matter most, and once you get used to using it you'll find it very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product and it died in 4 months. Amazon couldnt help as their warranty is 30 days. I called delongi and they advised it is still under warranty and they will replace it. I sent proof of purchase and am awaiting a replacement. I will make it 5 stars once that happens. About the product: I loved it. I loved cooking with it. It makes dinners aesy and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: 1363 is just taller than 1163, width and depth are still the same.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the 1163 for almost 3 years, and it still works great. I purchased the 1363 for one reason, and that's because the heating element on top is further away. The length and width are the same as the 1163. The only issue with this product is the pan is not replaceable. Delonghi would make a fortune if they sold those separately. Still though, there is no rust at all on my 3 year old 1163. It's just difficult to clean, and most times, I ended up cleaning it once a week after using it for about 1000 days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Neil

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: got this for my mom who needs a little help now and then, and after showing her some simple steps to use it, she is very happy with it. it is big so make sure you have the counter space, but other than that i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Graycloud Rios

customer_reviews.title: While it works it is fabulous. Then poof it's dead.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, it cooks fast and well. Easy to clean and has all the positive attributes you would want in an air-fryer - except after 1 year and 2 months and stopped working. Very disappointed and aggravated. It was well taken care of so it wasn't abuse that cause the failure. Since it's out of warranty anyway, I am going to crack it open and see if I can determine the cause of its death.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana D.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks so fast and makes fantastic foods!
customer_reviews.text: I'm here because of Air Fryer Recipes with Booger500us from Youtube. Her videos drove me to buy this air fryer and I have no regrets, its a great fryer. I've had a slew of great crunchy fried stuff lately - Hot wings, prawns, quesadillas, Chinese chicken and rice. You name it. Definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer! It's bigger than others, and it stirs my food for me! (The paddle can be removed for times when you don't want stirring.) Easy clean-up, too. It's great for roasted veggies without heating up the whole kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: does NOT match the pictures, heating element is too weak to brown food
customer_reviews.text: the bottom element is a single line, not double this means food doesnt brown, it cookcs ok, but the food on the pan doesnt get anywhere near the brown it should
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this . I use it everyday. French fries so fast and great too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Can cook anything in it. Best appliance purchase we have made
customer_reviews.author: sydney t.

customer_reviews.title: best Kitchen gizmo ever
customer_reviews.text: one of the very best buys ever made ~~ this thing works wonderfully ~~ all that We had hoped for & more
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Love and Wow
customer_reviews.text: Really love this I was in the UK visiting and my friends bought an air fryer different brand and saw it at work, so when I got home I looked these up and found this one with better reviews and it was well worth it, and I have purchased this brand before. So if you want to cut down on oil and deep fry this is the one to buy, amazing what you can cook in this machine, so cut the oil just needs like a teaspoon not bottles of oil, again Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia G. Pingleton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of using I can say DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY because: 1- Easy to scratch 2- Very noisy 3- Pricey 4- For the price I paid I expected better performance 5- NOT EASY TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.author: muatasim

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome appliance! I use it 3 or four times a week. All the flavor and crispness of deep frying without the calories and oil mess. Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Troy Mason

customer_reviews.title: Have your fried chicken again!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. If you are watching what you eat or eating healthy, you can now have that fried chicken without all the added fat. Works amazing, super impressed! Easy clean up and storage. Doesn't heat the house up on those hot summer days. Plus you can take it on the road with you if you travel and cook/eat healthy, or carry to a so ial event for on going cooking like french fries. Overall awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the Black Friday for my mom. We have used this almost weekly since she got it. It is so convenient and easy to use. It is also healthier since less oil is needed for 'frying'.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift Delivered Dec 18, 2017 today the top part will not heat up the fan works but no heat the bottom heater does. Very disappointed in this product. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Requires a ton of power to use
customer_reviews.text: You better make sure your circuit you plug this into, will handle the power needed to run it. I was so close to contacting the place I bought this through, as it shut off immediately after turning it on for the first time. Checked the breakers and none tripped. Checked the gfci, and that was tripped. Still contemplating if there might be something wrong with it, but it does say it requires 1400 watts to run it, so you would need a 20 amp breaker on the circuit to comfortably keep this running. Hope this isn't a lemon
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Don't need my sauté pan any more. Much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Still requires stirring on occasion but cooks w much less oil or use wine, beer whatever. Food gets done evenly and reasonably quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: after 7 month broken down doesn’t work at all I do not recommend for nobody very bad quality look likely China trash
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love how it works and being able to watch the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it works and being able to watch the food from the clear cover is absolutely a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aytsi

customer_reviews.title: Plastic stir and many inside parts!!!!!! Crazy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems a good cooker/fryer, by many reviews. One thing I didn't even think about before purchase was the material of the parts. There are so many plastic ones inside include the stir, lid, and in close contacts. How a cooker expensive and highly rated like this made mostly plastic??!! It's unbelievable!! No matter what they will tell you the plastic is and will be harmful from the heat, especially to females. Return for sure.
customer_reviews.author: T400

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Did some chicken wings and they turned out ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Did some chicken wings and they turned out under cook and boiled not fried. Kept them in for 15 more minutes than suggested and they were still not fried. Can't understand why some one would pay $250.00 for this product.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

product_meta.title: De'Longhi FH1363 MultiFry Extra, Air Fryer and Multi Cooker, Black
product_meta.description: De’Longhi MultiFry Extra, model FH1363, is an innovative cooking appliance that’s both an air fryer and a multicooker. Now, you can easily prepare a wide variety of your favorite recipes on your countertop – from crispy French fries to sauces and steaks to salmon. MultiFry Extra even bakes pizzas, cakes and pies. Air frying offers a healthier way to enjoy your favorite foods; little to no oil means less fat, without sacrificing the taste you love. De’Longhi MultiFry Extra’s even larger 60 oz capacity, which is more than double most air fryers on the market, allows you to prepare healthier fried foods and delicious favorites for a large group of friends and a big family. The Patented Surround Cooking System surrounds the food with heat to cook it evenly for best results in frying and cooking. Rapidly cook a range of dishes with the combined upper, fan assisted, and lower heating elements. Enjoy excellent cooking performance with the simultaneous convection and grill cooking process for food that is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. The exclusive design of the MultiFry allows cooking with or without the mixing paddle for an infinite variety of recipes. It is easy to use and create boundless recipes with its intuitive controls. Plus, the dishwasher safe parts make for a quick, worry-free clean up. Additional features include automatic mixing process, on/off heating element function, power level dial, removable mixing paddle, non-stick & anti-scratch ceramic coated bowl, transparent lid and removable timer.
feature_bullets: With multifry' s exclusive surround cooking system and automatic mixing paddle, you can prepare healthier fried foods and delicious favorites
Multifry is an innovative low-oil fryer that allows you to prepare delicious recipes with little or no additional oil. Enjoy healthier versions of your favorite fried foods
The automatic mixing paddle consistently mixes food allowing you to fry, sauté and roast a variety of recipes without stirring
The innovative construction of the two heating elements surrounds the food with heat for a fast, even cooking process
60 ounce food capacity; body material: plastic
Clean-up is easy with the removable and dishwasher-safe lid, paddle and bowl.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars135 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
